docs.snippet: Mexican authorities said attackers killed four members of a civilian police patrol in the turbulent southern state of Guerrero, while two city police officers and five gunmen died in a series of gunbattles in the northern border town of Rio Bravo....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican authorities said attackers killed four members of a civilian police patrol in the turbulent southern state of Guerrero, while two city police officers and five gunmen died in a series of gunbattles in the northern border town of Rio Bravo.

headline.main: 11 Killed in Mexico, Including 2 Police in Town on US Border
headline.print_headline: 11 Killed in Mexico, Including 2 Police in Town on US Border

docs.snippet: Fantasy sports have created a class of fans who view players’ successes, failures and injuries only through the distorted prism of their own made-up rosters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fantasy sports have created a class of fans who view players’ successes, failures and injuries only through the distorted prism of their own made-up rosters.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column examines how fantasy football has to some extent de-humanized NFL players, encouraging participants to see them as game pieces, and diminished team loyalties.

headline.main: Fantasy Sports’ Real Crime: Dehumanizing the Athletes
headline.print_headline: Memo to Fans of Fantasy Sports: Injuries Affect Players’ Lives

docs.snippet: High school students across the country are making oral history this week by recording interviews with their elders in an unprecedented effort to stockpile wisdom for the ages....
docs.lead_paragraph: High school students across the country are making oral history this week by recording interviews with their elders in an unprecedented effort to stockpile wisdom for the ages.

headline.main: Kids Making Oral History With StoryCorps Holiday Project
headline.print_headline: Kids Making Oral History With StoryCorps Holiday Project
